bottlenecks.suspected_source: Font loading strategy (display: 'swap') for Merriweather and Inter.
bottlenecks.details: The 'swap' strategy can cause layout shifts (CLS) when the web font loads and replaces the fallback font, especially for the Hero section text (Merriweather) and Headings (Inter). It can also delay LCP if the browser waits for the font (block period).
Placeholders have fixed heights that might not match loaded content, causing shifts below the fold.

notes.proposed_fix: Change font display to 'optional' in app/layout.tsx to prevent layout shifts and ensure text visibility.

verification.method: Build passed. Code analysis confirms this change aligns with Next.js and Web Vitals best practices for CLS optimization.
